attributes.action: Ban Eddie Butler from commentating on an international rugby match
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From the example set by Bill McLaren, international rugby commentators have left their nationalistic bigotry out of their duties as impartial commentators.
Butler has failed miserably in this respect and is a disgrace to Rugby. He should remember that there are English viewers who find his sarcastic comments regarding anything English simply unprofessional and offensive.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
